author: scottbw
msg: Added W3C Widget Interface conformance test suite. Currently this will load the test widgets, create instances, and then add an iframe link for each to an output HTML page to "eyeball" the results. It sort of works in a crude way; it already identifies a few issues we need to look at.

author: scottbw
msg: Included author info in the widget metadata sent to widget at runtime.

author: jukka
msg: 2.0: Restore the 2.0.0-SNAPSHOT version for another attempt at mvn release:prepare
